section.p:
If you want to re-initialize timers, for example, when you have set new timers, proceed as follows using the operator Web client:
From the operation list, select reinittimers and click select.
Click execute.
The currently registered timers are listed and detailed information is displayed when they will expire the next time.

conbody.section:
The syntax of the respective CLT command is as follows:
java -jar oscm-operatorsvc-client.jar <userkey> <password> reininttimers
